creator: Extramarks Education
descriptionHtml:
A fun, exciting, and interactive mode of learning goes live with the latest version of ‘Extramarks – The Learning App’! Meet Alex, an AI based learning companion, who will take you on a personalized journey through engaging visuals and rich media animations, and help resolve all your doubts instantly!

You will find solutions for everything on the app, through visual and interactive learning modules, including homework, projects, essays, tests, or assignments. NCERT solutions provided by Extramarks are the best. It is the only app which contains solutions for ALL SUBJECTS, ALL CLASSES, for both, the CBSE and ICSE Boards. It is among the most holistic education apps.

Exciting Highlights –
- Alex – Meet the first ever AI-backed studybot, who will help you reach your learning milestones, and will be with you at all times of day. You can simply click a picture of your doubt or the problem you want Alex to solve, and send it to him for instant resolution.
- Personalized Learning Journey – Alex curates an intelligent learning journey for you after considering your specific learning needs and academic goals. This learning path takes you on a journey through each chapter in a personalized manner, throwing in quick tests to assess the level of comprehension, and adapts to the results to curate the next milestone of the journey.
- Achieve – Achieve is a service which provides real time doubt resolution, problem solving , and complete mentorship, where Extramarks’ teachers use SNAAP (Student Needs Analysis and Academic Profile) to ensure that you do well in your academic journey.

The entire learning journey at Extramarks is backed by a robust Reports and Analytics platform, which helps you understand your personal and comparative performance. It helps you –
- Identify gaps and strength areas in your learning journey
- Get statistics on important metrics like average time spent per question, accuracy, level of mastery, etc.
- Gain insights into comparative performance, nationally, through peer ranking and analysis.
- Adopt an informed learning journey for the future through recommendations and changes in the personalized learning path.

Here are a few more aspects which make Extramarks special!

- Concept learning made easy through the use of a large repository of interactive, rich media-based learning modules.
- Concepts are broken down into bite-sized modules to maximize retention of knowledge.
- ONLY learning app covering the entire K12 spectrum for both CBSE and ICSE boards.
- Interactive, engaging and immersive learning modules, using latest 2D and 3D animation techniques.
- You can take a tour of a pre-historic site, or see how a heart pumps blood or how nuclear power is generated through virtual reality based learning modules.

All this is now made available to you through attractive MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION packages. No need to buy heavy annual packages – simply subscribe to the application at a fraction of the price!

From KG to grade 12, the application covers the entire K12 spectrum. It is favoured among education apps, because it is the one place to find the solutions for all subjects like Science, Maths, Social Science, English, English Core, English Elective, Hindi, Sanskrit, Economics, History, Geography, Political Science, Accountancy, Business Studies, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Computer Science (C++ and Python), Informatics Practices, Multimedia Web and Technology and much more. Its practice and study material is aligned to NCERT books and covers all topics along with NCERT Solutions.

Extramarks is recommended across the country by expert academicians like the Principal of MES Pattambi School, Kerala, Asha Byju.

Choose your board, class and subject and start learning in the fun way!
descriptionShort: Study online with Live Classes, all subjects (CBSE / ICSE), NCERT Solutions 💯

A fun, exciting, and interactive mode of learning goes live with the latest version of ‘Extramarks – The Learning App’! Meet Alex, an AI based learning companion, who will take you on a personalized journey through engaging visuals and rich media animations, and help resolve all your doubts instantly!

You will find solutions for everything on the app, through visual and interactive learning modules, including homework, projects, essays, tests, or assignments. NCERT solutions provided by Extramarks are the best. It is the only app which contains solutions for ALL SUBJECTS, ALL CLASSES (KG to 12), for both, the CBSE and ICSE Boards. It is among the most holistic education apps.

Exciting Highlights –
- Alex – Meet the first ever AI-backed studybot, who will help you reach your learning milestones, and will be with you at all times of day. You can simply click a picture of your doubt or the problem you want Alex to solve, and send it to him for instant resolution.
- Personalized Learning Journey – Alex curates an intelligent learning journey for you after considering your specific learning needs and academic goals. This learning path takes you on a journey through each chapter in a personalized manner, throwing in quick tests to assess the level of comprehension, and adapts to the results to curate the next milestone of the journey.
- Achieve – Achieve is a service which provides real time doubt resolution, problem solving , and complete mentorship, where Extramarks’ teachers use SNAAP (Student Needs Analysis and Academic Profile) to ensure that you do well in your academic journey.

The entire learning journey at Extramarks is backed by a robust Reports and Analytics platform, which helps you understand your personal and comparative performance. It helps you –
- Identify gaps and strength areas in your learning journey
- Get statistics on important metrics like average time spent per question, accuracy, level of mastery, etc.
- Gain insights into comparative performance, nationally, through peer ranking and analysis.
- Adopt an informed learning journey for the future through recommendations and changes in the personalized learning path.

Here are a few more aspects which make Extramarks special!

- Concept learning made easy through the use of a large repository of interactive, rich media-based learning modules.
- Concepts are broken down into bite-sized modules to maximize retention of knowledge.
- ONLY learning app covering the entire K12 spectrum for both CBSE and ICSE boards.
- Interactive, engaging and immersive learning modules, using latest 2D and 3D animation techniques.
- You can take a tour of a pre-historic site, or see how a heart pumps blood or how nuclear power is generated through virtual reality based learning modules.

All this is now made available to you through attractive MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION packages. No need to buy heavy annual packages – simply subscribe to the application at a fraction of the price!

From KG to grade 12, the application covers the entire K12 spectrum. It is favoured among educational apps, because it is the one place to find the solutions for all subjects like Science, Maths, Social Science, English, English Core, English Elective, Hindi, Sanskrit, Economics, History, Geography, Political Science, Accountancy, Business Studies, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Computer Science (C++ and Python), Informatics Practices, Multimedia Web and Technology and much more. Its practice and study material is aligned to NCERT books and covers all topics along with NCERT Solutions.

Extramarks is recommended across the country by expert academicians like the Principal of MES Pattambi School, Kerala, Asha Byju.

Choose your board, class and subject and start learning in the fun way with Best Learning App available!

Its practice and study material is aligned to NCERT books and covers all topics along with NCERT Solutions.

Extramarks is recommended across the country by expert academicians like the Principal of MES Pattambi School, Kerala, Asha Byju.

⭐️Extramarks is one of the leading online Study Apps to find Instant Video Solutions to all your doubts. Get PDF and video solutions of JEE mains & JEE Advanced previous year papers, NEET previous year papers, NCERT solution for class K-12, CBSE, ICSE, All-State boards and other competitive exams.

⭐️Attend online classes, and interactive lessons, gather study materials for K-12, NCERT, JEE, NEET and learn more with our education app. Get taught by the best teachers in India in an interactive & immersive learning environment.

⭐️Get Unlimited Access to all courses, Test series, Practice sessions, Online study material, Assignments, Doubt Solving sessions & lot more

⭐️Our extensive library of study materials is prepared by subject matter experts. With animated educational videos, we make online learning fun!

Extramarks work on the tested pedagogy of learn-practice-test, which encourages students to experience in-depth learning. It's the one-stop solution for all your online learning needs!
Here’s what students can do on Extramarks - Online Learning App:



✔️Attend live classes from anywhere
✔️Interact with your teacher directly, and get doubts cleared in real-time
✔️View recorded lessons and engaging videos
✔️Unlimited access to practice questions curated by industry experts from top universities.
✔️Study online by accessing different courses such as K-12, CBSE, NEET, JEE Foundation, and many more
✔️Download and practice from the previous years’ questions papers
✔️Track your progress after taking tests with the app’s AI-backed report and analysis
✔️Track and manage all your classes, events and tasks with a calendar
✔️Explore career opportunities with the app’s Career Assessment program

Competitive Exams - JEE, JEE Mains, and NEET

⭐️Access JEE previous year question papers with solutions, solved papers with explanations.
⭐️Topic wise objective questions for JEE, important formulae & video, etc.
⭐️Access Question Bank for JEE & NEET
⭐️Free JEE & NEET Mock Tests for practice
⭐️JEE quiz tests, revision notes and videos in Hindi

What makes Extramarks one of the best Online Education Apps in India? Our students find these features on Extramarks – Online Learning App useful:

💻Simple UI: The app provides a seamless user experience so that you can navigate easily.
🖥️Live Chat: Get doubts resolved in real-time with the Live Chat feature.
📚Question Banks: Practice and gauge what you have learnt with over 1.5 lakhs of questions.
🔍Self-Test: Create your own test to assess your progress.
⏳Practice Tests: Attempt mock tests or answer questions from the previous years’ exams.
👍Recommendations: Get recommendations based on your learning history.
👪Create Multiple Profiles: Easy navigation in case student wants to access CBSE/ICSE/NEET/JEE.
📚1.5 Lakhs Practice Questions: Test your preparation topic-wise to be through with your concepts with 1.5 Lakhs+ Practice Questions.
📝Create your own Tests: Create your own tests based on chapters & difficulty.

With over 15 years of experience in the industry, the Extramarks Learning app has enabled millions of students in the country to learn online, making it one of the best education apps. Additionally, over 10k+ schools trust our app to run online classes efficiently.

D-180, Sector-63, Noida-201301, India

creator: Extramarks Education
descriptionHtml:
Extramarks – Online Learning App for Class K-12, JEE, NEET, NCERT Solution

⭐️Extramarks is one of the leading online Study Apps to find Instant Video Solutions to all your doubts. Get PDF and video solutions of JEE mains & Advanced previous year papers, NEET previous year papers, NCERT solution for class K-12, CBSE, ICSE, All-State boards and other competitive exams.

⭐️Attend online classes, and interactive lessons, gather study materials for K-12, NCERT, JEE, NEET and do more with our education app. Learn from the best teachers in India with a real-world learning experience.

⭐️Get Unlimited Access to all courses, Test series, Practice sessions, Online study material, Assignments, Doubt Solving sessions & lot more

⭐️Our extensive library of study materials is prepared by subject matter experts. With animated educational videos, we make online learning fun!

Extramarks work on the tested pedagogy of learn-practice-test which encourages students to experience wholesome learning. It's the one-stop solution for all your online learning needs!
Here’s What Students Can Do On Extramarks - Online Learning App



✔️Attend live classes from anywhere
✔️Interact with your teacher directly, and get doubts cleared in real-time
✔️View recorded lessons and engaging videos
✔️Unlimited access to practice questions curated by industry experts from top universities.
✔️Study online by accessing different courses such as K-12, CBSE, NEET, JEE Foundation, and many more
✔️Download and practice from the previous years’ questions papers
✔️Track your progress after taking tests with the app’s AI-backed report and analysis
✔️Track and manage all your classes, events and tasks with a calendar
✔️Explore career opportunities with the app’s Career Assessment program

Competitive Exams - JEE, JEE Mains, and NEET

⭐️Access JEE previous year question papers with solutions, solved papers with explanations.
⭐️Topic wise objective questions for JEE, Important formulae & video, etc.
⭐️Access Question Bank for JEE & NEET
⭐️Free JEE & NEET Mock Tests for practice
⭐️JEE quiz tests, revision notes and videos in Hindi

What Makes Extramarks One Of The Best Online Education Apps In India? Our students find these features on Extramarks – Online Learning App useful.

💻Simple UI: The app provides a seamless user experience so that you can navigate easily.
🖥️Live Chat: Get doubts resolved in real-time with the Live Chat feature.
📚Question Banks: Practice and gauge what you have learnt with over 1.5 lakhs of questions.
🔍Self-Test: Create your own test to assess your progress.
⏳Practice Tests: Attempt mock tests or answer questions from the previous years’ exams.
👍Recommendations: Get recommendations based on your learning history.
👪Create Multiple Profiles: Easy navigation in case student wants to access CBSE/ICSE/NEET/JEE.
📚1.5 Lakhs Practice Questions: Test your preparation topic-wise to be through with your concepts with 1.5 Lakhs+ Practice Questions.
📝Create your own Tests: Create your own tests based on chapters & difficulty.

With over 15 years of experience in the industry, the Extramarks Learning app has enabled millions of students in the country to learn online, making it one of the best education apps. Additionally, over 10k+ schools trust our app to efficiently run online classes.


☎️Contact Us
📞Toll-Free
1800 102 5301
🧰Products and Services
customersupport@extramarks.com
🔧Technical Queries
support@extramarks.com
📄For Feedback

title: Extramarks – The Learning App

container.value:
Extramarks Education India Pvt. Ltd.
D-180, Sector-63, Noida-201301, India

creator: Extramarks Education
descriptionHtml:
Extramarks Online Learning App for Class K-12, JEE, NEET, CUET, NCERT Solution.


Extramarks is one of the leading online study apps to find instant video solutions to all your doubts. Get PDF and video solutions of JEE mains & JEE Advanced previous year papers, NEET previous year papers, and NCERT solutions for class K-12, CBSE, ICSE, All-State boards and other competitive exams.


⭐️Attend online classes, and interactive lessons, gather study materials for K-12, NCERT, JEE, and NEET, and learn more with our education app. Get taught by the best teachers in India in an interactive & immersive learning environment.


⭐️Extramarks studying app offers unlimited access to all courses, test series, practice sessions, online study material, assignments, doubt-solving sessions & lot more.


⭐️Online learning app with an extensive library of study materials is prepared by subject matter experts. With animated educational videos, we make online learning fun!


Extramarks work on the tested pedagogy of the learn-practice-test, which encourages students to experience in-depth learning. It is one of the best learning apps for all your online learning needs!


Extramarks - The Learning App is one of the best apps for study with key features:


✔️Attend live classes from anywhere

✔️Studying app helps you interact with your teacher directly, and get doubts cleared in real-time

✔️View recorded lessons and engaging videos

✔️Unlimited access to practice questions curated by industry experts from top universities

✔️Study online by accessing different courses such as K-12, CBSE, NEET, JEE Foundation, and many more

✔️Extramarks education app lets you download and practice from the previous year’s question papers

✔️Track your progress after taking tests with the study app’s AI-backed report and analysis

✔️Track and manage all your classes, events and tasks with the study app’s calendar

✔️Online classes app lets you explore career opportunities with the app’s Career Assessment Program

✔️An array of online courses and live classes


Competitive Exams - JEE, JEE Mains, and NEET


⭐️Access JEE previous year's question papers with solutions, and solved papers with explanations.

⭐️Topic-wise objective questions for JEE, important formulae & video, etc.

⭐️Access Question Bank for JEE & NEET

⭐️Free JEE & NEET Mock Tests for practice

⭐️JEE quiz tests, revision notes and videos in Hindi


What makes Extramarks one of the best online education apps in India? Our students find these features on Extramarks The Learning App useful:


🖥️Live Chat: Get doubts resolved with the live chat feature.

📚Question Banks: Practice and gauge what you have learnt with lakhs of questions.

⏳Practice Tests: Attempt mock tests or answer questions from the previous year’s exams.

👪Create Multiple Profiles: Easy navigation if students want to access CBSE/ICSE/NEET/JEE.


📚Practice Questions: Test your preparation topic-wise to be thorough with your concepts with lakhs of practice questions.


With over 15 years of experience in the industry, the Extramarks Learning app has enabled millions of students in the country to learn online, making it one of the best education apps. Additionally, over 10k+ schools trust our studying app to run online live classes efficiently.


Learn online from the safety of your home on one of India's best education apps!


Contact Us

📞Toll-Free

1800 102 5301


🧰Products and Services

customersupport@extramarks.com


Technical Queries

techsupport@extramarks.com


For Feedback

title: Extramarks – The Learning App

container.value:
Extramarks Education India Pvt. Ltd.

creator: Extramarks Education
descriptionHtml:
Extramarks The Learning App is one of India’s best apps for students which helps them to excel in their academics.


The educational study app unlocks a whole new way to learn and offers content for Grades 1-12, CBSE, ICSE, state boards, IIT JEE, NEET, and many more. Get unlimited access to all courses, test series, online study material, assignments, LIVE in-class doubt solving & lots more.


💻What makes Extramarks – The Learning App different?


⍟ Extramarks education app provides easy and user-friendly access to live online classes and interactive doubt-solving sessions to help students achieve their goals. It also offers after-school connectivity, which allows kids to revise everything they learned in school as recorded lectures are shared on a daily basis.


⍟ Get the same learning experience as the school with the comfort of being at home with the best study app. Learn from top faculty anytime, anywhere.


⍟ Based on the tested pedagogy of Diagnose, Learn, Practice, Test & Evaluate, which encourages students to learn wholesomely


⍟ Provides its learning content, aligned with multiple National & State Boards, for all subjects including Science, Maths, English, Sanskrit, Social Science, Psychology, Biotechnology, Sociology, Computer Science, Economics & Information Practices, for all classes from K-12


🖥️Extramarks – The Learning App Features:


⭐️Live Classes from Top Faculty - Learn from India’s best teachers, Extramarks LIVE online education ensures that every student of Grade K-12, CBSE, ICSE, State Boards, IIT JEE & NEET receives personalized attention. Take free classes on India’s best online education App.


⭐️Active & Interactive Learning - Extramarks Smart Class Plus focuses on conceptual learning instead of rote learning. With the help of interactive learning, students learn with 3D videos, games, quizzes, puzzles & more. It also increases the retention of the concepts.


Active learning asks questions in between the topic. If the student gets it right, it progresses or else it offers learning suggestions to improve.


⭐️Weekly tests and Homework – Regular weekly tests with a formative assessment before a final exam coupled with creative grading can help students learn better.


⭐️Doubt Solving Sessions – The educational study app offers unlimited in-class doubt-solving, where the student can solve his doubts instantly with the help of expert faculty in the doubt-solving session.


⭐️Power Questions & Power Test – Practicing before an exam helps students understand the exam’s pattern. It helps students to develop strategies and pace up. With power questions, Extramarks’ content repository becomes truly unlimited as every question becomes a template of its own. The AI present in the app changes the value of the question & gives out unlimited questions to practice.


⭐️Real-time progress reports – Students can analyze learning progress, strengths & areas of improvement through real-time reports based on Bloom’s taxonomy.


⭐️Cloud-based Services - Access to all the learning material without any interruptions or delays with real-time content updates.


With over 15 years of experience in the industry, the Extramarks Learning App has enabled millions of students to learn, making it one of the best education apps. With Extramarks’ learner-centric approach and 360-degree school solutions, it has earned the trust of over 15,000+ schools across the world


📞Contact Us


1800 102 5301


🧰Products and Services


customersupport@extramarks.com


🖥️Technical Queries


techsupport@extramarks.com


For Feedback

creator: Extramarks Education
descriptionHtml:
Learning app for K-12, JEE and NEET students of all boards, covering all subjects taught in school for self-study; complete with live classes, video lessons, doubt solving, endless test questions, personalized recommendations & more in affordable, customizable packages.


Welcome to Extramarks Learning App – one app that enables students to design their learning journey as per their needs.


💻 What makes Extramarks – The Learning App different?


⍟ Extramarks offers Learning on Demand, allowing users to purchase customizable packages as per their learning needs – full syllabus, one subject, one chapter, practice & test module, learnlist and more


⍟ Extramarks education app provides easy and user-friendly access to live online classes and interactive doubt-solving sessions to help students achieve their goals. It also offers after-school connectivity, which allows students to revise everything they learned in school through recorded lectures


⍟ Get the same learning experience as the school with the comfort of being at home with the best study app. Learn from top faculty anytime, anywhere


⍟ Based on the tested pedagogy of Diagnose, Learn, Practice, Test & Evaluate, which encourages students to learn wholesomely


⍟ Provides learning content, aligned with multiple National & State Boards, for all subjects including Science, Maths, English, Sanskrit, Social Science, Psychology, Biotechnology, Sociology, Computer Science, Economics & Information Practices, for all classes from K-12


🖥️Extramarks – The Learning App Features:


⭐️Live Classes from Top Faculty - Learn from India’s best teachers, Extramarks LIVE online education ensures that every student of Grade 6-12, CBSE, ICSE, State Boards, IIT JEE & NEET receives personalized, one-on-one attention


⭐Game-based learning - Extramarks Smart Class Plus focuses on conceptual learning instead of rote learning. With the help of Interactive Learning, students learn with 3D videos, games, quizzes, puzzles & more. It also increases the retention of the concepts. Active Learning asks questions in between the topic


⭐️Weekly tests and homework – Regular weekly tests, mock tests and previous year question papers with a formative assessment before a final exam coupled with creative grading can help students learn better


⭐️Doubt solving sessions – The educational study app offers unlimited in-class doubt-solving and through search tools


⭐️Power Questions & Power Test – Practicing before an exam helps students understand the exam pattern. With power questions, Extramarks’ content repository becomes truly unlimited as every question becomes a template of its own. The AI in the app changes the value of the question & gives out unlimited questions to practice


⭐Personalized recommendations - Students can track learning progress, strengths & areas of improvement through real-time reports based on Bloom’s taxonomy analysis. The app also suggests learning material based on areas of improvement


With over 15 years of experience in the industry, the Extramarks Learning App has enabled millions of students in the country to learn, making it one of the best education apps. With Extramarks’ learner-centric approach and 360-degree school solutions, it has earned the trust of over 15,000+ schools across the world. Your search for a learning partner ends here at Extramarks.


📞Contact Us


1800 102 5301


🧰Products and Services


customersupport@extramarks.com


🖥️Technical Queries


techsupport@extramarks.com


For Feedback


playstorefeedback@extramarks.com

This app is a comprehensive all subjects learning app, designed to cater to K-12, JEE, and NEET students across all boards, including CBSE and ICSE. Whether you're looking for a self-study program or live online classes, Extramarks offers it all in affordable, customizable packages.



Discover Extramarks, the ultimate learning app for students seeking NCERT solutions. With our customizable packages, you can access tailored learning modules for specific chapters, subjects, or entire syllabus.



🖥️ Extramarks – The Learning App Features
  • 🎓 Live Classes from Top Faculty- Learn from India’s best teachers, Extramarks LIVE online education ensures that every student of Grade 6-12, CBSE, ICSE, State Boards, IIT JEE & NEET receives personalized, one-on-one attention.


  • 🎮 Game-based learning- This focuses on conceptual learning instead of rote learning. With the help of Interactive Learning, students learn with 3D videos, games, quizzes, puzzles & more.


  • 📝 Weekly tests and homework - Regular weekly tests, mock tests and previous year question papers with a formative assessment before a final exam coupled with creative grading can help students learn better.


  • ❓ Doubt solving sessions - The educational study app offers unlimited in-class doubt-solving and through search tools.


  • 💡 Power Questions & Power Test - Practising before an exam helps students understand the exam pattern. With power questions, Extramarks’ content repository becomes truly unlimited as every question becomes a template of its own.


  • 📊 Personalized recommendations - Students can track learning progress, strengths & areas of improvement through real-time reports based on Bloom’s taxonomy analysis. The app also suggests learning material based on areas of improvement.
